dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S550 IS: Small Business Investment Company Modernization Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Risch introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship

form.official-title: To amend the Small Business Investment Act of 1958 to provide for increased limitations on leverage for multiple licenses under common control, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Small Business Investment Company Modernization Act of 2013.
Section 303(b)(2)(B) of the Small Business Investment Act of 1958 (15 U.S.C. 683(b)(2)(B)) is amended by striking $225,000,000 and inserting $350,000,000.
